author: Shaurya Malwa
title: XRP, Solana Lead Profit-Taking Among Crypto Majors Even as Bullish Mood Persists
description: Bitcoin hovers below its record high amid easing geopolitical tensions, ETF inflows, and optimism for stablecoins.
content:
